entry.title: Multi CSV Transaction
entry.summary: The email thread discusses the usage of OP_CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY (CSV) in transactions. A member named Praveen Baratam wants to know if multiple CSV endpoints can be used to allow different conditions at different delays. Daniel Robinson replies that it is possible with Bitcoin Script by using nested IF statements and enforcing different conditions in each branch. He also provides an Ivy script and the corresponding Bitcoin Script. The Ivy script compiles to the Bitcoin Script shown. The email includes an image attachment of the multi CSV endpoint diagram.
